attributes.action: Make financial awareness a compulsory syllabus in the UK public education system
attributes.additional_details: I am a Wealth Manager in Belgravia and regulated by the FCA.
attributes.background: Practical teaching about topics such as finance is vital. Children should know about the value of money and the difference between income and capital. This is probably the most important things young people should know by the time they are 16 years of age.
